data.title: 49+ Best How I Met Your Mother Trivia Questions & Answers
data.meta_description: Check out this list of How I Met Your Mother trivia questions! Test your knowledge of the iconic characters, moments, and plot twists of this beloved sitcom.
data.text:
Question: What is the name of the character played by Alyson Hannigan in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Lily Aldrin

Question: What is the name of the character played by Ben Vereen in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: James Stinson

Question: What is the name of the character played by Bob Saget in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Future Ted

Question: What is the name of the character played by Chris Elliott in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Mickey Aldrin

Question: What is the name of the character played by Chris Kattan in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Trevor

Question: What is the name of the character played by Cobie Smulders in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Robin Scherbatsky

Question: What is the name of the character played by David Henrie in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Son

Question: What is the name of the character played by Frances Conroy in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Loretta Stinson

Question: What is the name of the character played by Jason Segel in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Marshall Eriksen

Question: What is the name of the character played by Jennifer Lopez in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Anita

Question: What is the name of the character played by Jennifer Morrison in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Zoey Pierson

Question: What is the name of the character played by Joe Manganiello in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Brad Morris

Question: What is the name of the character played by John Lithgow in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Jerry Whitaker

Question: What is the name of the character played by Josh Radnor in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Ted Mosby

Question: What is the name of the character played by Kyle MacLachlan in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: The Captain

Question: What is the name of the character played by Laura Bell Bundy in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Beth

Question: What is the name of the character played by Laura Prepon in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Karen

Question: What is the name of the character played by Lucy Hale in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Katie

Question: What is the name of the character played by Lyndsy Fonseca in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Daughter

Question: What is the name of the character played by Mandy Moore in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Amanda

Question: What is the name of the character played by Neil Patrick Harris in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Barney Stinson

Question: What is the name of the character played by Rachel Bilson in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Cindy

Question: What is the name of the character played by Sarah Chalke in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Stella Zinman

Question: What is the name of the character played by Sarah Silverman in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Naomi

Question: What is the name of the character played by Tony Hale in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Gary Blauman

Question: What is the name of Marshall's wife in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Lily Aldrin

Question: What is the name of Robin's ex-boyfriend in "How I Met Your Mother" who is also Ted's best friend?

Answer: Barney Stinson

Question: What is the name of Ted's best friend in "How I Met Your Mother"

Answer: Marshall Eriksen

Question: What is the name of Ted's ex-girlfriend in "How I Met Your Mother" who he has a tumultuous on-again, off-again relationship with?

Answer: Robin Scherbatsky

Question: What is the name of the bar that the main characters frequent in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: MacLaren's Pub

Question: What is the name of the episode in "How I Met Your Mother" where the main characters attend a Halloween party at a college?

Answer: Slutty Pumpkin

Question: What is the name of the episode in "How I Met Your Mother" where the main characters attend a wedding in Atlantic City?

Answer: The Rehearsal Dinner

Question: What is the name of the episode in "How I Met Your Mother" where the main characters attend a wedding in Chicago?

Answer: The End of the Aisle"

Question: What is the name of the episode in "How I Met Your Mother" where the main characters attend a wedding in Cleveland?

Answer: The Best Man

Question: What is the name of the episode in "How I Met Your Mother" where the main characters attend a wedding in Farhampton?

Answer: The Lighthouse

Question: What is the name of the episode in "How I Met Your Mother" where the main characters attend a wedding in Long Island?

Answer: The Mermaid Theory

Question: What is the name of the episode in "How I Met Your Mother" where the main characters attend a wedding in the Hamptons?

Answer: The Wedding

Question: What is the name of the episode in "How I Met Your Mother" where the main characters play a game of laser tag?

Answer: Laser Tag

Question: What is the name of the main character in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Ted Mosby

Question: What is the name of the man who owns MacLaren's Pub in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Carl

Question: What is the name of the narrator in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Future Ted

Question: What is the name of the recurring character in "How I Met Your Mother" who is obsessed with laser tag and Canadian pop music?

Answer: Scooter

Question: What is the name of the recurring character in "How I Met Your Mother" who is obsessed with magic and is also a colleague of Ted's at Goliath National Bank?

Answer: Gael

Question: What is the name of the song that plays during the closing credits of "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: I'll Be Alright

Question: What is the name of the song that plays during the opening credits of "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Hey Beautiful

Question: What is the name of the woman Ted ultimately marries in "How I Met Your Mother"?

Answer: Tracy McConnell
